Class Bus

java.lang.Object
Bus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Bus extends Object implements Cloneable
Date: 12/9/2021 This class is for creating busses with all specifications required and for performing some related procedures such as loading students, sending the bus and so on.
Author:
Ali Almousa + Ahmed Alhkyal

    • Bus

      public Bus​(int scheduledDormDeparture, int ID)
      A constructor for creating a bus with two specifications determined by the caller
      Parameters:
      scheduledDormDeparture - is the time this bus has to move to campus
      ID - is the unique identifier of the bus

    • sendBus

      public void sendBus​(int days, ArrayList<Student> tempStudents, ArrayList<ArrayList<Flight>> flightReport, ArrayList<Student> studentsALl, ArrayList<Flight> flightsAll)
      Send the bus to campus and conclude the flight data and update all students data
      Parameters:
      days - is the day this sending is taken place at
      tempStudents - a temporary ArrayList of students in the whole day
      flightReport - ArrayList of ArrayList of flights holding all data of flights and students and busses in it
      studentsALl - ArrayList of the whole students in this day with updated data
      flightsAll - ArrayList of flights holding all flights this bus had made
